sentences.sContent: Workers have erected scaffolding around the base of the tower below the roadway.
sentences.sCn: 工人们已经在车行道下的塔基四周竖起了脚手架。

synos.tran: 脚手架；搭脚手架的材料

words.tran: 给…搭脚手架；用支架支撑

trans.tranCn: 脚手架；搭脚手架的材料
trans.tranOther: a set of poles and boards that are built into a structure for workers to stand on when they are working on the outside of a building
